member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri
member.summary: Represents a data URI object.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of SvgDataUri.

member.summary: Saves the image data in this data URI object to a file on disk.

member.summary: Saves the image data in this data URI object to a stream.

member.summary: Creates a standard data URI from an image in a disk file.

member.summary: Creates a standard data URI from an image file in a stream.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the values of a data URI from an href string.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.CharSetLength
member.summary: The length of the character set value in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.CharSetOffset
member.summary: The offset into where the character set value starts in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.Extension
member.summary: The common file extension of the image data in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.Href
member.summary: The href data

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.ImageFormat
member.summary: The LEADTOOLS image format that corresponds to the image data in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.IsBase64
member.summary: Indicates whether the value is encoded as a base 64 string.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.IsDataUri
member.summary: Indicates whether the href value contains a valid data URI object.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.MediaLength
member.summary: The length of the media type value in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.MediaOffset
member.summary: The offset into where the media type value starts in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.ValueLength
member.summary: The length of the image data value in the href.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgDataUri.ValueOffset
member.summary: The offset into where the image data value starts in the href.

member.summary: Ends a process that updates the elements (nodes) of an SVG document.

member.summary: Version 1.0

member.name: F:Leadtools.Svg.SvgVersion.v11
member.summary: Version 1.1

member.name: T:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds
member.summary: Represents the calculated bounds of an SVG document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the physical bounds, in pixels, of this SVG document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.IsTrimmed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bounds were calculated by cropping the child elements themselves and ignoring the SVG document size.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.IsValid
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the SVG document contains valid calculated bounds.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Svg.SvgBounds.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution (Dots per inch) of the SVG document.
